name: Classic Burger
description: Juicy beef patty, lettuce, tomato, cheese, special sauce, served with fries.

name: French Fries
description: Crispy golden french fries, perfectly salted.

name: Caesar Salad
description: Fresh romaine lettuce, crunchy croutons, shaved Parmesan, classic Caesar dressing.

name: Spicy Chicken Wings
description: Six fiery buffalo wings with a side of cool ranch or blue cheese dip.

name: Mojito
description: A refreshing blend of white rum, fresh mint, lime juice, sugar, and soda water.

name: Margarita
description: Classic tequila, triple sec, and fresh lime juice, served on the rocks or frozen.

name: Espresso Martini
description: Vodka, coffee liqueur, and freshly brewed espresso, a perfect pick-me-up.

name: Craft Beer IPA
description: A bold, hoppy, and aromatic India Pale Ale from a local brewery.

name: Local Lager
description: Crisp, refreshing local lager, perfect for any occasion.
